channel.title: Edgeyewcutterbanker 0.1b (srl)
channel.description:
is only a beta version based on an old one script but i kept from it only the switch minimaptrees (adding some debugs and removing some unused loops) i am tryin to put all antirandoms and some works someone not. for start it sometimes you have to click on main screen. there is not fully autocolor finding but i really needed to set two const (don't know why but i fyndsymbol tree isn't working when starts the chopping main lkoop so i kept a treecolorMM) btw to my copm semms to work except antirandoms (i've been killed aarrgh) i added some srl antibans hope i placed in right places on script ;) suggestions to improve it are well accepted and don't blast me alot if you find bugs remember is my first own script lol ;)
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 20, 2006, 06:52:09 AM[/size][hr]ok i have to put something different than randomchat because it starts talking toomuch lol [br][size=1]Posted at: July 20, 2006, 07:11:13 AM[/size][hr]gimme a min to change it ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: July 20, 2006, 07:11:30 AM[/size][hr]changed so is less chatter lol

item.title: Edgeyewcutterbanker 0.1b (srl)
item.dc:creator: @_hai - hai -
item.description:
@_hai wrote:

Hmm i’m not sure about randoms , im using this as my anti randoms in a willow cutter/banker at draynor

Procedure Randoms; begin setRun(true) FindNormalRandoms; ClickToContinue; CloseWindow; FindLamp('Woodcutting'); FindDead; FindMod; FindMime; FindMaze; FindQuiz; FindFrog; FindDemon; FindEnt(TreeColor); FindHead; if (FindFight = True) then begin SetRun(True) RunawayDirection('E')//Direction to run in when youre attacked Wait(2000 + random(1000)) SetRun(False) End;

And this will run you away in the direction that you put in.

Read full topic

item.title: Edgeyewcutterbanker 0.1b (srl)
item.dc:creator: @_hai - hai -
item.description:
@_hai wrote:

Looks nice ,
One thing i did notice is that at the end of your script you have

Until(false);

You cant have an endless loop in SRL , so you must either make it stop after a certain amount of time or after its got you to a certain wc lvl.

Put this into your const

Glvl = 60;//lvl you want it to get you to then stop

And change
until(false); with this until(GetSkillLevel('Woodcutting')=Glvl);

Read full topic
